meanings.definition: A type of soup made with beets and usually served cold.
meanings.sent1: I tried a delicious borschts at the restaurant last night.
meanings.sent2: The borschts at the picnic was refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: When the borschts spilled, it looked like a vibrant purple puddle.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled out like a pot of borschts on the stove.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the borschts filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various borschts for us to choose from.
meanings.sent2: We brought home containers of leftover borschts from the party.
meanings.sent3: The borschts on the table seemed to multiply when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The borschts in the garden were actually just colorful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with jars of homemade borschts.
